name: sir
sir chart
func:
let x = msg.payload.x
let t = []
let s = []
let i = []
let r = []
let n = []

for (j = 0; j < x.length; j++) {
t[j] = x[j].t
s[j] = x[j].s.toPrecision(4)
i[j] = x[j].i.toPrecision(4)
r[j] = x[j].r.toPrecision(4)
}

msg.payload = [{
    "series": ["susceptible", "exposed", "infectious", "recovered", "deceased" ],
    "data": [s, n, i, r, n],
    "labels": t
}]
node.send([]) // clear chart
return msg

name: interventions
func:
let t1 = flow.get('t1') || Infinity
let t2 = flow.get('t2') || Infinity
let R1 = flow.get('R1')
let R2 = flow.get('R2')
let interventions = [{"day":t1,"R0":R1}, {"day":t2,"R0":R2}]
interventions = interventions.sort(function(a,b){return a.day - b.day})
msg.payload.interventions = interventions
return msg

name: Re
func:
let x = msg.payload.x
let R0 = msg.payload.R0
let t = []
let s = []
let i = []
let r = []
let n = []

for (j = 0; j < x.length; j++) {
t[j] = x[j].t
s[j] = x[j].s
i[j] = x[j].i
r[j] = x[j].r
}

x[0].approxRe = msg.payload.R0
for (j = 1; j < x.length; j++) {
     x[j].approxRe = 1 + msg.payload.D * 2 * (i[j] - i[j-1]) / (i[j] + i[j-1]) // approximate
}

for (j = 0; j < x.length; j++) { // exact
    x[j].Re = R0 * s[j]
}


msg.payload.x = x
return msg;

name: Re chart
